descContentsLister displays a list of miscellaneous contents of an object being examined.

descContentsLister :   ItemLister

lister.t[335]

no description available

showSubListingOVERRIDDEN

english.t[3214]

Flag: Show a sublisting (i.e. the contents of the items in our immediate contents, in parentheses after the name of the item, if the gameMain option useParentheticalListing is true.

Methods  

listed (obj)OVERRIDDEN

lister.t[333]

is the object listed in an EXAMINE description of its container?

showListEmpty (parent)OVERRIDDEN

english.t[3202]

If there’s no contents to list, but the item whose contents we were trying to list wants to report its open-or-closed status, simply state that it’s open or closed.

showListSuffix (lst, pl, paraCnt)OVERRIDDEN

english.t[3192]

Otherwise start the listing without explicitly mentioning that the container is open. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
